content:
Craft an item of type: blue_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 61, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 27, "index": 25}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "sweet_berries", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "shroomlight", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft blue_stained_glass, I need to first craft glass. Glass requires sand or red_sand, which I do not have. Therefore, I will first need to gather some sand. I can do this by moving the cornflower from slot 31 to slot 1, as this will allow me to craft blue_dye which is also required for the final recipe.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: blue_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "cornflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 61, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete", "quantity": 27, "index": 25}, {"type": "sweet_berries", "quantity": 21, "index": 34}, {"type": "shroomlight", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the blue_dye, I can move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can use it later.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: blue_stained_glass

thought: To craft blue_stained_glass, I need to craft 8 glass blocks and 1 blue dye. I have already collected the blue dye, so I will start by smelting 1 sand block to create 1 glass block. I will smelt the sand block at index 17 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 17 to slot 12 with quantity 1
